summary.span: 提供可用于自动管理打印服务器、打印队列和打印作业的类。

span.span: Provides classes that enable you to automate the management of print servers, print queues, and print jobs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间包含具有以下核心类：This namespace contains the following core classes: - 类，该类是其他核心打印类的基类。The class, which is the base class for the other core printing classes. - 类，该类表示实际的打印服务器，通常一台计算机。The class, which represents an actual print server, usually a computer. - 类，该类表示实际的打印队列和其打印机。The class, which represents an actual print queue and its printer. - 类，该类表示特定的打印作业。The class, which represents a particular print job. - 类，它指示如何处理打印作业的打印机。The class, which instructs the printer how to process a print job. 类派生自每个类具有和方法。Classes derived from the class each have a and a method. 必须使用这些方法以确保它们表示的硬件或软件组件的已同步的类的实例。You must use these methods to ensure that instances of the classes are synchronized with the hardware or software components that they represent. 命名空间还包含许多枚举描述打印机功能，如打印机是否可以生成逐份打印输出，并指定打印机，如用于打印作业的纸张大小的说明。The namespace also includes many enumerations that describe printer capabilities, such as whether a printer can produce collated output, and that specify instructions to printers, such as the paper size to use for a print job. 此命名空间是增强打印提供的服务的 Windows Presentation Foundation 的一部分。This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with Windows Presentation Foundation. 使用 Windows 窗体的托管的代码开发人员必须使用中的 Api命名空间。Managed code developers using Windows Forms must use the APIs in the namespace. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
